title: Behold the Lamb of God
itunes:title: Behold the Lamb of God
description: John the Baptist's designation of Jesus as Lamb of God is, I submit, largely misunderstood. It has little to do with Jesus' meekness, mildness, or humility and everything to do with his being the victim of a sacrifice. To find out why this is such good news, listen to the sermon!

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
